markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Knockback Strike](/Feats.aspx?ID=6019) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=561" />
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=656" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 124 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

You focus your strength into a blow powerful enough to push an enemy away from you. Make an unarmed Strike. If you hit, attempt an [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36) check to [Shove](/Actions.aspx?ID=2380) the target. This attack uses the same multiple attack penalty as your Strike, and doesn't count toward your multiple attack penalty.

<title level="2">Knockback Strike leads to...</title>
[Improved Knockback](/Feats.aspx?ID=6027)
name: Knockback Strike
